title: Exploitation - Flush plans in Oracle memory before the EOD*1 batch

task_list.instruction_title:
As part of ATLAS Sanity Checks, we want to make sure that the TITJOU job will run properly when time comes. AS such, our DBAs have to clear up all the plans sitting in memory on the PROD-LIKE environment.

Please run this command on ATLAS ORACLE DB server in PROD Like:

**alter system flush shared_pool;**




**Demander a l'operateur de déclencher le job :**

EV3 : E3_T001ORA_FLUSH

** 
_
**
Reply DONE to the initial CUTOVER email.
